name: Project DT
description:
The main character here will be a girl who is destined to become a hero. Apparently, you will have to fight with huge robots.

Also, the game will clearly raise the issue of transhumanism. In the trailer flashes the inscription: "It is not clear whether it is a girl or a car."

Previously, the Digital Sky studio has established itself as a mobile game developer. Her portfolio includes projects based on Dragon Ball Z and Tokyo Ghoul.

Unfortunately, there is still very little information. We hope to hear more details about the game in the near future, including the estimated release date and the platforms on which it is going to be released.
